code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function addImage(){if(!document.getElementById("img")){var image=document.createElement("img");image.id="img";image.src="images.jpg";document.body.appendChild(image);}}function deleteImage(){var img=document.getElementById("img");img.parentNode.removeChild(img);}function biggerImage(){var img=document.getElementById("img");img.style.width="35%";}function smallerImage(){var img=document.getElementById("img");img.style.width="15%";}function Image(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:"img",src:"images.jpg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addImage,children:"\u0414\u043E\u0434\u0430\u0442\u0438"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:biggerImage,children:"\u0417\u0431\u0456\u043B\u044C\u0448\u0438\u0442\u0438"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:smallerImage,children:"\u0417\u043C\u0435\u043D\u0448\u0438\u0442\u0438"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:deleteImage,children:"\u0412\u0438\u0434\u0430\u043B\u0438\u0442\u0438"})]})]});}export default Image;
